players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "'I find it strange that Alice was the one who was found dead last night. Let's stay vigilant and make sure we trust no one until we have more information.'..."
Charlie: "'Let's try to figure out who could have possibly harmed Alice last night. We need to work together as a team and share any information we may have.'"

Diana: "I agree with Charlie that we need to work together as a team and share any information we may have. However, I don't think we should jump to conclusions just yet. It's important to remember that there could be other explanations for Alice's death..."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
